events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this is not what I paid for.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to an incorrect item being delivered.
Your case has been assigned to our support agent Alex who will assist you with the refund process.
Hello! I’m Alex, and I’m here to help you with your refund request regarding the wrong product you received.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with your order number so I can verify the details?
I have attached the photo of the wrong item alongside my order confirmation number in the attachment.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund within 3-5 business days and you will receive a confirmation email shortly.
Thanks for your quick response. I appreciate the prompt handling of the refund and look forward to the confirmation email.
Your refund has been successfully processed and the amount credited back to your original payment method. Please check your bank statement.
We just wanted to follow up and ensure that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
The case has been closed as your refund issue was resolved successfully. Thank you for contacting support!
